modName: Ellean Crystaline - A Familar Faces Follower File
summary: Ellean Crystaline - A Familar Faces Follower File
descriptionHtml:
[size=15pt][b]Description[/b][/size]

This is a file you can put into your Familiar Faces folder to access this character.
Ellean Crystaline, is a half elf half Breton princess.

[color=red][size=15pt][b]Requirements[/b][/size][/color]

[b][u]The Body ----> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url] & [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48647]LNBTBBP[/url][/u][/b]

[b][u]The Skeleton ----> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNP BLESSED BODY- UNPB REDUX PROJECT[/url][/u][/b]

[b][u]The main mod ----> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54509/?]Familiar Faces [/url][/u][/b]

[color=yellow][u][b]The following list shows the mods that are required to completely recreate Ellean in your Skyrim [/b][/u][/color]


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]"ApachiiHair.esm"[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]"RaceMenu.esp"[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]"RaceMenuPlugin.esp"[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenuOverlays.esp"[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]"TheEyesOfBeauty.esp"[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12944/?]"CharGen Morphs.esp"[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3871/?]"WeaponsOf3E.esp"[/url],
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51569/?]"calyps-bosmer.esp"[/url],
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/834-bosmer-ceremonial-lingerie/]"bosmer-lingerie.esp"[/url]
[url=http://www.4shared.com/archive/9s4lXwfJce/Bosmer_Ceremonial_Lingerie_BS2.html]Bodyslide 2 file for Bosmer Ceremonial Lingerie[/url]

Body texture ----> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4686/?]CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096[/url]

Muscle map ----> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13377/?]Sporty Sexy Map[/url]

[color=orange][size=15][b]Installation[/b][/size][/color]
NMM user:
Just activate the mod!

Manual installation:
1)Extract the file to Data/vMYC


[color=yellow]*(The file has not been tested by users like you, if you find it's working, please tell me asap!)[/color]
